Key Match Events: Edwin Díaz threw eight of his first 10 pitches for balls and subsequently hung a slider to Corbin Carroll, who launched it for a go-ahead grand slam.
Luis Severino suffered a bruised right foot on a comebacker earlier in the game.
Edwin Díaz has a 4.30 ERA in his first season back from March 2023 surgery to repair a torn patellar tendon in his right knee.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Carlos Mendoza expressed confidence in Edwin Díaz's ability to rebound despite the loss.
Outfielder Brandon Nimmo acknowledged the uphill battle the Mets face in the Wild Card race.
